Address.value: 6 RESEARCH DRIVE, SHELTON, Connecticut, 06484, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Edgewell Personal Care Co is a personal-care company. The operating segments of the company include Wet Shave, Sun and Skin Care and Feminine Care. Some of the brands offered by the company include Edge, Skintimate, Personna, Schick, Carefree, Playtex, Banana Boat and Hawaiian Tropic.
